verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H5079"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* banish \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* ashamed, \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w hairy|strong="H8181"\w* mantle \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w deceive|strong="H3584"\w*.

Each \w will|strong="H3808"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tiller|strong="H5647"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground \w is|strong="H5030"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* possession \w from|strong="H5030"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* say \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H5221"\w* scars \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5221"\w* \w back|strong="H1004"\w*?’ \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* say, ‘\w The|strong="H5221"\w* scars \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* received \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* friends.’

\w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* stands \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w little|strong="H6819"\w* \w ones|strong="H6819"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, two-thirds \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H1478"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w into|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w melt|strong="H6884"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H7992"\w* melts \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w test|strong="H6884"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H7992"\w* tests \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* myself \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.’ \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.’
